name: Galactic Greenhouse
description:
Galactic Garden

A platformer set in the stars about gaining abilities based on die rolls. If your plant friends hurt you without a helmet on, you'll get a time penalty. Use your abilities to beat your previous lap time! 

Made in Godot in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 for the theme 'Roll of the Dice'

Controller and fullscreen button on Itch recommended. Thanks for playing!

controls ~

Movement -- Left Stick, DPad, WASD, Arrow Keys

Jump -- Bottom face button, Z, Space

Propellant Belt -- Left face button, X

Cute Flower Friend -- Top face button, C

Retry -- Button in Pause Menu (Start, Esc)
